name: Koftix Attack!
description:
You play as Jacob, an astronaut-carrier. You woke up after a cryogenic sleep and you see that Koftixes, insects-aliens, have settled on your ship through asteroid crash and created their nests on it. Destroy these 4 nests and the remaining monsters.

Controls:

W, A, S, D - Move.

Mouse - Look Around.

Left Mouse Button - Shoot.

F - Turn Off/On Flashlight.

Escape - Quit to Main Menu.

This game was made for SimpleJam#1. I made it myself, using free non-commercial assets. Hope you'll enjoy it.^^
